column3: Shouldn't this be applied to the `0.9.0` branch instead of `master`?\n
@gmaxwell @sipa @laanwj Please may this pull request get some comments/ACKs?\n

Automatic sanity-testing: FAILED MERGE, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p3786_5548acce365699f162844dad1acba2a0e514dbeb/ for test log.

This pull does not merge cleanly onto current master
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.lo

it took 3 months to deal with this for a one line change... and then you close it because it needed rebasing...

you are serious?!
Yes. After it took you more than a month to rebase a silly one-line change.\n
Anyhow, if you resubmit it rebased I'll try to merge it immediately.\n
